description:
A ladder above Hakumei and Mikochi’s home leads to many mysteries. One of them is an unexpected new resident that differs from the rest…
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: A Ladder in the Tree / The Metropolitan Lifestyle / Photo of a Smile
Jujou no Hashigo to Tokaiteki na Seikatsu to Egao no Shashin
Les échelles en haut de l`arbre / Vie urbaine / Un sourire en photo
樹上の梯子 と 都会的な生活 と 笑顔の写真
나무 위의 사다리 / 세련된 도시생활 / 웃는 사진
